message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it holds significant value and would be a worthwhile investment for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $16,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value.  While $20,000 represents a fair price, I'm willing to meet you halfway at $18,000. This feels like a win-win situation to me.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'd like to counter with $17,000 for the product. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're considering.
